metadata.title: CVE-2023-45359 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Vector Skin component for MediaWiki before1.39.5 and 1.40.x before 1.40.1. vector-toc-toggle-button-label is notescaped, but should be, because the line param can have markup.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
